questions.name: question1
questions.q: If someone asks me for my name, I should always give it to them
questions.correct: Great job! Don't tell others your name online!
questions.wrong: Never share your real name online with strangers!

questions.name: question2
questions.q: It's a good idea to ask an adult for help when I'm not sure how to do something on the computer
questions.correct: Right! If you're not sure, always ask for help!
questions.wrong: Always ask for help if you're not sure what to do

questions.name: question3
questions.q: I shouldn't click on links I don't recognize
questions.correct: Nice job! Whenever you're not sure if you should click on something, don't!
questions.wrong: Don't click on links if you're not sure where they're from!

questions.name: question4
questions.q: I should share my password with my friends
questions.correct: Right! Don't share your passwords, even if you trust your friends!
questions.wrong: Always keep your passwords secret, even if you trust your friends

questions.name: question5
questions.q: If someone asks me to give them my phone number, I should do it
questions.correct: Good job! Always keep your personal information safe!
questions.wrong: Don't ever give your phone number, or other personal information, with someone else!

questions.name: question6
questions.q: I should ask my parents before posting anything online
questions.correct: Good job! Always ask your parents before posting online!
questions.wrong: Wrong! Always ask your parents before posting online!

questions.name: question7
questions.q: I should say things that will hurt other's feelings if I want to
questions.correct: Right! Don't hurt other's feelings, even if you're mad at them!
questions.wrong: Never try to hurt someone else's feelings!

questions.name: question8
questions.q: If anyone says something online that makes me upset, I should tell my parents
questions.correct: Nice job! Always ask your parents for help when someone says something mean!
questions.wrong: It's always OK to ask your parents for help when someone says something mean!

questions.name: question9
questions.q: I should meet someone at a library or coffee shop if I talk to them online a lot
questions.correct: Correct! Don't meet strangers, even if you feel like you know them!
questions.wrong: Wrong! Be safe and don't meet strangers online!

questions.name: question10
questions.q: I should always ask permission before using a computer, phone, or tablet
questions.correct: Right! Asking permission is always a good idea!
questions.wrong: Wrong! Always ask your parents for permission!

questions.name: question1
questions.q: All pandas in the world are on loan from China
questions.correct: Correct! All pandas are on loan from China!
questions.wrong: Wrong! All pandas are on loan from China

questions.name: question2
questions.q: There are only about 200 pandas left in the wild
questions.correct: Correct! There are actually about 2,000 pandas in the wild!
questions.wrong: Wrong! There are actually about 2,000 pandas in the wild!

questions.name: question3
questions.q: 99% of panda's diets are bamboo
questions.correct: True! About 99% of panda's diets are bamboo!
questions.wrong: Wrong! It's true that about 99% of panda's diets are bamboos!

questions.name: question4
questions.q: Baby pandas eat the feces of their mothers
questions.correct: It's true! Pandas really do eat the feces of their mothers
questions.wrong: Wrong! It's true that pandas really do eat the feces of their mother!

questions.name: question5
questions.q: Pandas can poop up to 40 times a day
questions.correct: It's true! Pandas can poop up to 40 times a day!
questions.wrong: It's true! Pandas can poop up to 40 times a day

questions.name: question6
questions.q: Pandas lives up to 50 years in the wild
questions.correct: Correct! Pandas only live about 20 years in the wild!
questions.wrong: False! Pandas only live about 20 years in the wild!

questions.name: question7
questions.q: Pandas spend approximately 55% of its life eating bamboo
questions.correct: Correct! Pandas spend 55% of their lives eating bamboo!
questions.wrong: Wrong! Pandas do spend about 55% of their lives eating bamboo!

questions.name: question8
questions.q: A panda fur can be worth up to $100,000 on the black market
questions.correct: True! Panda furs are sure expensive!
questions.wrong: Wrong! Panda furs can be sold for up to $100,000 on the black market!

questions.name: question9
questions.q: A group of pandas is called a 'confusion'
questions.correct: Correct! A group of pandas is actually called an 'embarassment'
questions.wrong: Wrong! A group of pandas is actually called an 'embarassment'

questions.name: question10
questions.q: Adult pandas have to eat up to 20 pounds of bamboo a day to stay healthy
questions.correct: Correct! An adult panda actually has to eat up to 50 pounds of bamboo a day to stay healthy!
questions.wrong: Wrong! An adult panda actually has to eat up to 50 pounds of bamboo a day to stay healthy!

questions.name: question1
questions.q: What are the two parts of an if statement?
questions.correct: Correct! In an if statement, the code only runs if the condition is true!
questions.wrong: Wrong! In an if statement, there is a condition, and the code that runs only if the condition is true!

questions.name: question2
questions.q: What is a situation where an if statement would help?

ops.text: For chosing a color from a bunch of RGB values
When picking a new profile statement on Facebook
If a website wants to know if you are 12 years old or not
For when you need to run the same lines of code over again

questions.correct: Correct! A website could only let you enter if you are 12 years old by looking at what year you were born in!
questions.wrong: Incorrect! An if statement could determine if you are 12 or not, and let you in only if you are!

questions.name: question3
questions.q: When should you use an else statement after an if statement?

ops.text: If you want to always make something happen
As a default if no other condition is true
To make the same lines of code run over and over
To record when someone clicks something on the screen

questions.correct: Good job! It's for when no other condition is true!
questions.wrong: Incorrect! It's for when no other condition is true!

questions.name: question1
questions.q: When hippos are upset, what color does their sweat turn?
questions.correct: Great job! Hippos sweat turns red when they stressed!
questions.wrong: Incorrect! Hippos sweat turns red when they are stressed!

questions.name: question2
questions.q: Where is a shrimp's heart located?
questions.correct: Great job!
questions.wrong: Incorrect, a shrimp's heart is in it's head!

questions.name: question3
questions.q: How many ways are there to make change for $1?
questions.correct: Great job!
questions.wrong: Incorrect, the answer is 293!

questions.name: question4
questions.q: What family do almonds belong to?
questions.correct: Correct - great job!
questions.wrong: Incorrect, almonds are part of the peach family!

questions.name: question4
questions.q: How many muscles do cats have in each ear?
questions.correct: Nice job!
questions.wrong: Incorrect, cats have 32 muscles in each ear!

questions.name: question1
questions.q: When would a programmer use a for loop?

ops.text: to repeat the same lines of code
if they didn't know how many times something should run
to make their code easier to read

questions.correct: Great job! All of the above are correct!
questions.wrong: Incorrect! All of the above are correct!

questions.name: question4
questions.q: When would be a good situation to use a for loop?

ops.text: You need to check a user's age
You want to load an image of a dog
You need to add a long list of numbers up
You're not sure what else to use

questions.correct: Great job!
questions.wrong: Incorrect! It would be better to use a for loop when you need to add a long list of numbers up!
